price: Thuaj (o Muhamed): “Unë i lutem vetëm Zotit tim dhe nuk i shoqëroj Atij askënd (në adhurim)”.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
